Member Function Documentation

void clientDemo::start (    ) 
 

Starts the client.

Runs two threads: one for reading from keyboard and sending messages, second for reciving replays from server and displaying them on the screen.

Bug:
one of threads has no terminal to display messages
Author:
Borys Wisniewski
